para: The following changes have occurred for GridFTP since the last stable release, &previousversion;:
New API for embedding a GridFTP server in another application.
Support for dynamic registration and removal of data-nodes in a striping configuration.
Support for passing SAML assertions over the control channel.
New options in globus-url-copy for passing assertions, passing in extended server module parameters, and a new -list mode to get a directory listing.
